statements: SELECT id, account_number, report_date, amount, regulatory_approval FROM financial_reporting WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_reporting WHERE regulatory_approval = TRUE;
SELECT account_number, amount FROM financial_reporting WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, report_date, regulatory_approval FROM financial_reporting WHERE amount < 1000;
SELECT account_number, amount, regulatory_approval FROM financial_reporting ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, account_number, amount FROM financial_reporting WHERE regulatory_approval = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM financial_reporting WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT id, account_number AS acct_no, amount, regulatory_approval FROM financial_reporting ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_reporting;
SELECT id, account_number, report_date, regulatory_approval, amount FROM financial_reporting WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reporting;
SELECT id, report_date FROM financial_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT financial_data FROM financial_reporting WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, financial_data FROM financial_reporting WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT authority_name FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT * FROM financial_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT financial_data, report_date FROM financial_reporting WHERE financial_data > 10000;
SELECT authority_name FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE LENGTH(authority_name) > 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_reporting WHERE financial_data BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY financial_data DESC;
SELECT authority_name, reporting_requirements FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = 3;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT authority_name FROM RegulatoryAuthorities WHERE authority_id = 2;
SELECT id, regulation_name, reporting_frequency FROM ReportingRegulations WHERE regulation_id < 5;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT amount, date FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ReportingRegulations WHERE reporting_frequency = 'Quarterly' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT authority_name FROM RegulatoryAuthorities WHERE authority_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialData GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(amount) > 50000;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM financial_reports WHERE submitted = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT authority_name, address FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT data_category, data_value FROM report_data WHERE data_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, submitted FROM financial_reports WHERE submitted = true;
SELECT authority_name, address, contact_person FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT report_id, data_category, data_value FROM report_data WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY data_value DESC;

SELECT financial_reports.report_name, regulatory_authorities.authority_name, compliance_status.status FROM financial_reports INNER JOIN compliance_status ON financial_reports.report_id = compliance_status.report_id INNER JOIN regulatory_authorities ON compliance_status.authority_id = regulatory_authorities.authority_id ORDER BY financial_reports.report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, total_assets FROM financial_data WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT authority_name, authority_type FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_type = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM reported_data WHERE reported_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT log_id, report_id, submission_timestamp FROM report_submission_logs ORDER BY submission_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, total_assets FROM financial_data WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT authority_name, authority_type FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, requirement_description FROM reporting_regulations WHERE LENGTH(requirement_description) > 100;
SELECT report_id, submission_timestamp FROM report_submission_logs ORDER BY submission_timestamp ASC;
